about_the_game:
You're our hero, returning home after an average day.

As you casually glance up, you notice the light is on in your empty apartment...

Did you forget to shut it off, or...is it a burglar?!

You nervously open the door...

"Welcome home, Master!"

There's a girl waiting for you that you've never seen before...and a cute made, at that!
And if that wasn't surprising enough, this is what she blurts out next!

"Please...become my Master!!"

You don't have a clue what's going on, but you figure...what the heck!

"I'll do anything for Master...♪"

Her virginity is yours for the taking! And you don't have to think twice about cumming inside!
Sit back and relax as your own personal maid takes care of your every desire...and we do mean everything!

Product specification

  • A novel game that you can read by clicking
  • Full voice (female character)
  • CG Mode
  • Scene recollection

content_descriptors.notes: Adult expressions are included in the entire work.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium II 233MHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Required Resolution: 800 x 600
  • DirectX: Version 7.0a
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: PCM, Direct Sound
